[**Redevelopment Agency – Annual Notice – 202**](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/DocumentCenter/View/25259)

In accordance with Statute requirements of the Open Public Meetings Act C.10.4-8(d), listed below are the regularly scheduled meetings for the Redevelopment Agency of the Township of Woodbridge for the year 2025.  All meetings will be held on Tuesday afternoons in the third floor conference room of the Municipal Building, # 1 Main Street, Woodbridge, New Jersey, at 5:00 p.m. unless publicized to be held at another location.
Formal action may be taken at these meetings.

Heather LaMotta
Redevelopment Agency
Township of Woodbridge

* January 21, 2025 (Reorganization)
* February 18, 2025
* March 18, 2025
* April 22, 2025
* May 20, 2025
* June 24, 2025

* July 22, 2025
* August 26, 2025
* September 23, 2025
* October 21, 2025
* November 10, 2025
* December 16, 2025


Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

The Redevelopment Agency of the Township of Woodbridge is responsible for implementing redevelopment plans.
The Redevelopment Agency has 7 members. Two of the members are Municipal Council members who are appointed by the governing body. His/Her term of office is one year unless he/she completes their term as a council member. No more than two members can be officers or employees of the township.
The rest of the Redevelopment Agency is comprised of citizens of the township who are appointed by the Mayor and confirmed by the Municipal Council. Their (staggered) terms of office is 5 years.


Review current and previous year
development audit reports
.
